diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Limb Girdle Muscular Dystrophy type 1E due to a de novo mutation in the DES gene encoding desmin.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient's clinical presentation included cardiac conduction system disease, progressive muscle weakness, elevated creatine kinase levels, and significant findings on muscle biopsy indicative of myofibrillar myopathy. Genetic testing confirmed a pathogenic variant R406W in the DES gene, unifying the diagnosis of muscular dystrophy with cardiac manifestations.
